result.execSummary:
The defendant Jon G Martinez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Strangulation and Suffocation [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.235(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Submit to DNA sample.  Undergo anger management and domestic abuse counseling and any other counseling per agent.    If probation/extended supervision revoked or discharges with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

supervisions.notes:
Without huber privileges.
Consecutive to: to any other sentence

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jon G Martinez in court with attorney Dennis Joseph Ryan.  Defendant Jon G Martinez in custody.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Matter is resolved.  State gives recommendation.  Plea to Count 2.  Dismiss/read in Count 1, 3 & 4.  Attorney Ryan agrees. Defendant agrees and understands.  No Contest Plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court. finds Defendant guilty.  State had victim notification.  Court withholds sentence.
Count 2:
3 years Probation
146 days credit if revoked. 
DNA surcharge $250/sample
Anger management and domestic abuse counseling and any other counseling per agent.  
AODA & treatment
$268.00 costs & $100.00 domestic abuse surcharge & Supervision Fees (PAID THRU PROBATION)
Counts 1, 3 & 4 Dismissed/read in.
Paperwork handed in court.
Final pre-trial on October 20, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Jury trial on October 28, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Prelim. Hrg. waived, Rec'd copy of INFO/waived reading.

Defendant Jon G Martinez in court with attorney Dennis Joseph Ryan.  Defendant Jon G Martinez in custody.  Linda Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Ryan advises of waiver of preliminary hearing today.  Defendant agrees and understands.  Court finds probable cause, bind over for Br 2.  Proceed to argn.

Pre-trial conference on June 27, 2014 at 10:45 am.
Return date on July 10, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Jon G Martinez in court with attorney Dennis J Ryan.  Defendant Jon G Martinez in custody.  Linda A Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Just appointed to case.  Requests PTC and RD.  Time limits continued waived.  Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 27, 2014 at 10:45 am.  Return date scheduled for July 10, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on June 6, 2014 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Jon G Martinez by video from LEC with attorney Stanley V Woodard.  Defendant Jon G Martinez in custody.  Sue M Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Woodard explains nonappearance/states DE is homeless.  DE is eligible for PD appt.  State requests cash bond.  Atty Woodard responds.  Court orders $500.00 cash bond.  Special bond conditions:  No contact w/KJF or her residence or her children.  Absolute sobriety at all times.  May go to residence one time upon prior notice and w/law enforcement to retrieve belongings if that hasn't been done yet.  Time limits cont'd waived but Atty Woodard requests prelim.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 6, 2014 at 02:30 pm.
Defendant Jon G Martinez not in court.  Sue M Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State request warrant.  Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant.
no contact w/KF, residence or children; Absolute Sobriety

Pre-trial conference on May 2, 2014 at 10:30 am.
Return date on May 16, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Jon G Martinez by video from LEC with attorney Debra V. O'Rourke.  Defendant Jon G Martinez in custody.  Sue M. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  DE hasn't applied for PD appt yet.  Advised rights to an attorney.  Requests Preliminary hearing; Time limits waived.  $2,000.00 signature bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  No contact w/K.J.F. or her residence or children and absolute sobriety at all times.  May go to residence one time upon prior notice and w/law enforcement to retrieve his belongings.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 2, 2014 at 10:30 am.
